plot: Yoshimori Sumimura, a 14-year-old junior high school boy, is a Kekkaishi, an exterminator of monsters. He is vying with Tokine Yumikura to be the heir to the Sumimura clan. Tokine is older than he, and she is his childhood friend as well as his rival Kekkaishi. To save people from danger, and to make himself stronger, Yoshimori fights against monsters.
opening_theme: "Sha la la - Ayakashi NIGHT" (Sha la la-アヤカシNIGHT-) by Saeka Uura
ending_theme: "Akai Ito" (赤い糸; "Red String") by Koshi Inaba (eps 1-15, 38, 40, 48, 52)
"Sekaijū doko o Sagashite mo" (世界中どこを探しても) by Aiko Kitahara (eps 16-23, 39, 44, 51)
"My Mirai" (マイミライ; "My Future") by Saeka Uura (eps 24-30, 41, 46, 49)
"Kyūkei Jikan Juppun" (休憩時間10分; "10 Minute Recess") by Saeka Uura (eps 31-37, 42-43, 45, 47, 50)
